attributes.contentHtml:
I found Qlox host it was giving high ram
So I said owner for sponsorship he aggres and send agreement , but I don’t send agreement and he thought I send , then he gave me 1lakh plus ram said use as much ram u need , than I sus on him , than he came in ur server and abused everyone so my staff banned him , so he is saying me to nuke our server , and said I will sue u for 600k and met u with my lawyer , but I was smart I didn’t signed agreement
He gave me killing threats that he will kill my family I was thinking to suicide
I have all proff please help

attributes.title: QloxHost | Death Threats - Scamming - Trying to sue for not sponsoring
